title: Is A Team Entertainment a good company to audition to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say they are alright. They seem to manage VAV very well and the boys look happy a lot of the time. It is a smaller company as well so higher chanve of getting in. The only problem would be when you debut it will be rather hard to gain fame because the company isn’t as well known as others… but you know go ahead, it seems like a good choice of agency
